tool_description: Real-time data on more than 150k+ global ships location, coordinates, parameters, course, speed, and more. Access the ocean zones to track or get port descriptions.
name: Maritime Ships and Ports Database
title: Maritime Ships and Ports Database

api_list.name: Vessel finder API
api_list.description: You can search and withdraw all vessels by type, similar names, draught, deadweight, year built, and more. You don't need to know vessel MMSI or IMO for this endpoint, just filter the search criteria and receive the API response with all vessels matching your parameters.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://maritime-ships-and-ports-database.p.rapidapi.com/api/v0/vessel_find"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maritime-ships-and-ports-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Real-time Ship Tracking API
api_list.description: Datalastic API provides ship’s current position and related information such as longitude, altitude, speed, vessel course, vessel destination, and more.
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maritime-ships-and-ports-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Historical vessel data API
api_list.description: The historical vessel data API allows you to see vessel location and other events throughout your chosen dates. You can access the data easily and see vessel historical movement, activities speed, course, heading, destination and more.

        }

api_list.name: Vessel Info API
api_list.description: Get detailed data about a vessel specifications. Find ships name, IMO, MMSI, UUID, Call Sign, country, type, subtype, draft, TEU unit of cargo capacity, deadweight, liquid gas capacity, length, breadth, average draught, maximum draught, average speed, maximum speed, year built, homeport, activity status.

api_list.name: Location Traffic Tracking API
api_list.description: Location Traffic Tracking API allows you to scan an area in the sea or ocean to see all the ships in your selected area. This API Endpoint lets you find and track all the vessels in the radius and monitor maritime traffic in your zone.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://maritime-ships-and-ports-database.p.rapidapi.com/api/v0/vessel_inradius"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maritime-ships-and-ports-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Port finder API
api_list.description: Find maritime ports information, location, time zone, country even when you dont know the exact port name.

        }
